data.text: Finally, Job spoke, and he cursed the day that he was born.
He said,
“I wish that the day when I was born could be eradicated,
I wish that the day when I was born would have been covered in darkness.
I wish that thick/intense darkness would have filled that day,
I wish that the night when I was conceived would be erased from the calendar,
I wish that no child would again be conceived on that night of the month [MET],
I want those people who ◄curse/put evil spells on► days—those who know how to arouse/awaken the great sea monster—to curse that day.
I wish that the stars that shone early in the morning on that day after I was conceived will not shine again.
That was an evil day because my mother was able to conceive;
“I wish that I had died [RHQ] when I was born—
I wish that my mother had not [RHQ] allowed me to live.
If I had died at the time when I was born,
I would be resting with kings whose beautiful palaces that they built are now in ruins (OR, who rebuilt palaces that had previously been destroyed),
I would be resting with princes who were wealthy,
I wish that I had been buried like a child who died in its mother’s womb
After wicked people die, they do not cause any more troubles;
Those who were in prison rest peacefully after they die;
Rich people and poor people are alike after they die,

◄“Why does God allow those who are suffering greatly like me to continue to remain alive?/I do not understand why God allows those who are suffering greatly like me to continue to remain alive.► [RHQ]
They long/want to die, but they do not die.
When they finally die and are buried, they are very happy.
Those who do not know where they are eventually going when they die [RHQ],
I continually cry very much; as a result, I cannot eat;
Things that I always worried might happen to me, have happened to me;
Now I have no peace in my inner being,
